scripts.pot: wp i18n make-pot ./ languages/blockify.pot --exclude='wp,wp-content,vendor,tests,node_modules,build,assets,src' && echo 'Check nav menu refs'

scripts.svn: func() { npm run pot && npm run zip && cp ../../blockify.zip /Users/seothemes/Documents/Blockify/svn/blockify && cd /Users/seothemes/Documents/Blockify/svn/blockify && svn up && svn cp $1 $2 && cd $2 && rm -Rf ./* && cd .. && unzip blockify.zip -d $2 && rm blockify.zip && open -a Terminal .; }; func
